instances.text: I am one of the TAs for Statistical Dialogue Systems (NPFL099), helping with grading homework assignments and teaching the natural language generation for dialogue systems.
I was teaching a lab for Introduction to Linux (NSWI177) in Czech (finally in person!). Instead of lectures, the students had a "before-class reading" which we built upon during the lab.

I was teaching a lab for Introduction to Algorithms (NPRG062) and Programming 1 (NPRG030) in Czech via Zoom. Didn't expect my first class to be virtual, but finding ways to make it work was a nice challenge! The materials for the course can be found here.
